lead_paragraph: RABINOWITZ--Robert Marc. Born 1928 and raised in Brooklyn, NY, Robert was an artist, professor, and designer of multimedia Broadway productions. He is survived by wife Kate O'Toole Rabinowitz, son Marc, daughter Molly, sons-in-law John Pitsikalis and Rick Michalek and grandchildren Julia and Zelda. Informal reception: Riverdale on Hudson Funeral Home, 6110 Riverdale Avenue, Bronx, Wednesday, June 29, 2-5pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RABINOWITZ, ROBERT MARC
